name: Claussen Kosher Dill Pickle Spears, 24 fl. oz. Jar
short_description: One 24 fl oz jar of Claussen Kosher Dill Pickle Spears
Claussen pickle spears are crafted with fresh cucumbers picked straight from the vine
Always refrigerated for freshness
Pickled with a unique spice blend of turmeric, garlic, red pepper and more
No MSG, artificial colors or yellow no. 5
Kosher Certified and Vegan
Claussen pickles are a fat-free food for your picnic or barbecue
Perfect side for burgers, hot dogs and sandwiches at lunch or dinner
Enjoy as a snack or add to your charcuterie board
Resealable jar for easy and convenient storage
product_description: With a sweet and juicy kick, Claussen Kosher Dill Pickle Spears are full of flavor and crunch. Our Claussen pickle spears are crafted with fresh cucumbers picked straight from the vine and refrigerated for our classic Claussen crunch. Pickled with a unique spice blend of turmeric, garlic and red pepper, our dill pickle spears are great served on the side with your burgers, hot dogs and sandwiches. Claussen pickles are vegan, Kosher Certified and a fat free food, making them a delicious snack. They also make a great addition to your charcuterie board. Keep our 24-ounce resealable jar of pickle spears refrigerated. Whether you enjoy pickle chips or spears, slices or wholes, you can't beat Claussen's mouthwatering crunch.

name: Vlasic Stackers Kosher Dill Pickles, Keto Friendly, 24 FL OZ
short_description: One 24 fl oz jar of Vlasic Stackers Kosher Dill Pickles
Crunchy dill pickle slices with classic flavor
Sandwich pickles are naturally flavored using Vlasic's secret recipe
Sliced dill pickles contain 0 calories per serving
Fresh packed in a resealable jar to lock in flavor and crunch
product_description: Vlasic Stackers Kosher Dill Pickles kick up your sandwiches with sliced dill pickles that are full of classic flavor. All included ingredients, along with the Vlasic secret pickling recipe, make these sandwich pickles tasty. These naturally flavored dill pickle slices contain 0 calories per serving. Pre-sliced for convenience, these Kosher pickles are perfect for adding crunch and tart flavor to your deli sandwiches. They're fresh packed in a 24 fluid ounce resealable jar for easy storage to preserve the flavor. Vlasic offers several flavors and sizes of pickles, peppers and relish. Keto friendly: 1g net carbs (1g total carbs minus 0g dietary fiber), and 0g added sugar per serving.
